subject: Re: The case for faces.
author: Adrienne
full_text:
--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  I'm thinking there is faces embedded in sound, it's related to speech, and
> not just EVP. It seems to be a normal function of our own minds(living or
> dead), the same as reverse speech. I found some faces in old EVPs from boxes
> and also in music files. The ones from Evanescence are pretty impressive in
> person, and do not seem to be intentionaly embedded.
> 
>  I know, it's not ghost hunters, and most don't want to have to think.
> I think most want this stuff in a neat little box, all well defined, all
> rules and protocols known, but it just won't stay in one box, or universe
> for that matter.
> 
>  Frank-S
>
Dear Frank,

I think that I see what you mean.  I mean no offense, but I it would be helpful to see something a little more definitive that couldn't be mistaken for matrixing.  Is this possible?  Is it just me?

- Adrienne
